about.title: About ACT Lab
about.description: The ACT Lab is a research group focused on advanced computing and technology solutions. We aim to innovate and push the boundaries of technology to create impactful solutions for real-world problems.
about.mission: To advance the field of computing through innovative research and development, fostering collaboration and knowledge sharing.
about.vision: To be a leading research lab in advanced computing, recognized for our contributions to technology and society.

quickSnippets.title: TAKE A LOOK AT OUR VARIOUS HEALTHCARE TECH. PROJECTS
quickSnippets.description: We have been working on several healthcare projects, aiming to save lives and proceed towards a better future.
